texts.content: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I â€” I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.

section_title.title: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
section_title.subtitle: OUR COMPANY

headings.content: <mark>Go</mark> where you are celebrated, not tolerated

texts.content: Code Less Traveled is a neurodivergent (ND for short) owned and operated web development company that specializes in creating websites and web applications for ND individuals and the organizations they own/operate. Our team is made up of friendly and talented individuals who are passionate about using their skills to help others in the community.

If we could rewind to early 2023, we would see that I have just recently found myself with the dual diagnosis of Autism & ADHD at the age of 43 years old. After almost two decades of hand-crafting websites and web applications for corporate America, this diagnosis would prove to be a watershed moment in my life. It would push me to face challenges harder than anything else I had ever encountered. It would also cause me to find greater satisfaction and enjoyment in my own life than I could have ever dreamed of.

Ever the advocate for humanity, I became increasingly aware of just how neglected and under-served the neurodivergent community is. Being neurodivergent myself, I decided to put together a team of highly skilled individuals with whom I had worked over the years. It didn't take much convincing to get these amazing people on board with this project, and before we knew it we had a real motley crew.
